body:
One thing you could do is add args corresponding to all the environment variables we use in this script.

Like...
parser.add_argument(
  '--use_jemalloc',
  'Compile using jemalloc as malloc. Alternatively can set environment variable '
  'TF_NEED_JEMALLOC=1 to enable.')

...this would let all of this info also be documented by configure.py --help. I'm not sure how much use this would get though, and we are actively trying to remove things from the configure.py script (so many of these options might be deleted in the near future).
